name: MAYFLY
notes:
An early (late 1950's)light weight,low cost yet high performance dinghy. 
An unfinished, bare hull version was also available.
The single chine, slab sided hull also kept it within reach for the amateur builder.
Though several hundred were built and raced as a class for few years, it seems to have been dropped in favor of the similar but slightly larger SEAFLY, from the same builder which sold in larger numbers and was later offered in fiberglass.
An excellent web site, seaflymemories.com relates in greater detail, what is known of both boats, which today are rarely seen.
